column2: Nicklaus tutorial gives Colsaerts a big Masters boost AUGUSTA
column3: Georgia Sometimes golfers just get lucky and Belgian Nicolas Colsaerts could not believe his good fortune after spending an hour last week chatting to golfing great Jack Nicklaus about how to play the Masters.

column2: AIG files to dismiss part of Greenberg suit over bailoutFitch Publishes Updated Credit Analysis on AIGUPDATE 2-AIG files to dismiss part of Greenberg suit over bailout April 8 Insurer American International Group Inc  has asked a court to block Maurice "Hank" Greenberg's efforts to sue the U.S. government on AIG's behalf
column3: saying its former CEO has not proven he should have the right to do so. column4: saying its former CEO has not proven he should have the right to do so. (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO
column5: April 08 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings today published an updated credit  analysis on American International Group (AIG). The report provides a  comprehensive analysis of AIG's credit
column6: operating and financial profile. Fitch has an Issuer Default Rating of 'BBB+' on AIG with a Stable Rating  Outlook.  AIG's net profits over the last four years were materially affected by noncore  operations' results and restructuring activity. With the UPDATE 2-AIG files to dismiss part of Greenberg suit over bailout April 8 Insurer American International Group Inc  has asked a court to block Maurice "Hank" Greenberg's efforts to sue the U.S. government on AIG's behalf

column2: Soccer-Insurer Aon to sponsor Man Utd training kit LONDON
column3: April 8 Insurer Aon will sponsor Manchester United's training kit and have its name attached to the club's training ground under a new eight-year agreement announced on Monday.

column2: Brazil grants Chevron approval to restart offshore oil output RIO DE JANEIRO
column5: said on Monday that it authorized Chevron Corp  to restart output from an offshore oil field more than a year after a November 2011 spill forced the No. 2 U.S. oil company to stop production.
